item.title: D: i ask for to much help but its important :)
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Despair Mr. Despair
item.description:
@Mr_Despair wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:2, topic:338643”]Um.

case 74077:
// skill cape emote
SkillCape();
break;

or

case 74077:
// skill cape emote
c.SkillCape();
break;

Elementary programing fundamentals.[/quote]

I’m going to explain this a little for future reference

The

SkillCape();

calls the void SkillCape because of the ();, so if the void is present it’ll be called successfully.

Read full topic
item.source: D: i ask for to much help but its important :)

playerLevel[0] += 1;
sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[0]+"", 4016);

appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

}
